names.details: Ahvāz: A hill in Ḥūzistān. Its another name is ‘Uyūnşehr. It was called as Ahvāz as it was built by Ahvāz bin Sām bin Nūḥ. It was also called Sūḳ-ı Ahvāz. (translated by the first creator of the name resource.)
